abstracts.cdata!:
The Yemen Rainfed Agriculture and
            Livestock Project contribute to the higher development
            objectives of reducing poverty in rural areas and improving
            natural resources management. The restructuring includes:
            (i) the alignment of the Project Development Objectives, or
            PDO in the legal agreement with that in the Project
            Appraisal Document, or PAD and (ii) the modification and
            enhancement of selected indicators of the result framework
            and monitoring of the project. Country Director (CD)
            approval is sought since the proposed restructuring does not
            involve any modifications of the PDO as stated in the PAD
            nor a change in the safeguard category of the project, and
            therefore is being processed as a level two restructuring.
